note: This data is expressed in constant 2022 US$.
title: Net official development assistance to medical research and basic health sectors
subtitle: Net [official development assistance](#dod:oda) to medical research and basic health sectors. This data is expressed in US dollars. It is adjusted for inflation but does not account for differences in living costs between countries.
selectedEntityNames: Developed regions (Europe, Cyprus, Israel, Northern America, Japan, Australia & New Zealand)
